# Workshop Reader Registry {-}

Listed below are links to various workshop resources maintained by the UC Davis
DataLab. Want to know more information about a specific workshop session? Visit
the DataLab's [workshop archive page](https://datalab.ucdavis.edu/workshops/).

1. [Computing basics](#computing-basics)
2. [Data science concepts](#data-science-concepts)
3. [GIS](#gis)
4. [Miscellaneous](#miscellaneous)
5. [Python](#python)
6. [R](#r)
7. [Version Control](#version-control)

## Computing Basics

+ [Introduction to the Command
Line](https://ucdavisdatalab.github.io/workshop_introduction_to_the_command_line/)
+ [Introduction to SQL for Querying
Databases](https://ucdavisdatalab.github.io/workshop_intro_to_sql/)

## Data science concepts

+ [Critical Approaches to Data

Excel](https://ucdavisdatalab.github.io/workshop_keeping_data_tidy/)
+ [Principles of Data
Visualization](https://ucdavisdatalab.github.io/workshop_data_viz_principles/)
+ [README, Write Me! Digital Project Organization and

+ [Responsible Data
